name: Unruly Dogs on the Loose!
description:
Your unruly pack has lost their bones on the Island. Help this out of control pack retrieve all their treats before the ocean waves sweep them all away. 

Your pack is enthusiastic, but easily distracted, keep them on task and gather the bones before time runs out.

Assets Taken from the Unity Store

DoorFortyFour - TileWorldCreator

YOS Assets - Low Poly Hand Painted Puppies

Gamster -  Squirrel Low Poly

SuperCyan - CharacterPack Free Sample

Ahjay Stelino Mixkit - Playground Fun
